description: High-quality text-to-video generation with advanced prompt optimization and customizable duration options

prompt.description: The text prompt to guide video generation
prompt.placeholder: A Galactic Smuggler is a rogue figure with a cybernetic arm and a well-worn coat that hints at many dangerous escapades across the galaxy...

duration.description: The duration of the generated video in seconds

prompt_optimizer.description: Whether to use the model's prompt optimizer for better results

prompt_details.style_guide: Create detailed, descriptive prompts with rich character and scene descriptions for cinematic video generation
best_practices: Use vivid, descriptive language for characters and environments
Include specific details about appearance, clothing, and equipment
Describe the setting and atmosphere in detail
Mention character motivations and personality traits
Use cinematic terminology for professional results

prompt_structure.character_description: Detailed description of main characters and their appearance
prompt_structure.visual_elements: Specific visual details and cinematic elements

example_prompts.title: Sci-Fi Character
example_prompts.prompt: A Galactic Smuggler is a rogue figure with a cybernetic arm and a well-worn coat that hints at many dangerous escapades across the galaxy. Their ship is filled with rare and exotic treasures from distant planets, concealed in hidden compartments, showing their expertise in illicit trade. Their belt is adorned with energy-based weapons, ready to be drawn at any moment to protect themselves or escape from tight situations.

example_prompts.title: Fantasy Scene
example_prompts.prompt: A majestic dragon with iridescent scales soars through a mystical forest, its wings casting shadows over ancient ruins. The dragon's eyes glow with ancient wisdom as it navigates between towering trees and floating islands, creating a scene of pure fantasy and wonder.

request.prompt: A cat playing with a colorful ball in a sunny garden

example_requests.title: Character-Focused Video
example_requests.description: Detailed character description for cinematic results

request.prompt: A Galactic Smuggler is a rogue figure with a cybernetic arm and a well-worn coat that hints at many dangerous escapades across the galaxy. Their ship is filled with rare and exotic treasures from distant planets, concealed in hidden compartments, showing their expertise in illicit trade.

A professional chef preparing a gourmet dish in a modern kitchen, steam rising from the pan, dramatic lighting highlighting the ingredients, and the chef's focused expression showing years of culinary expertise

url.description: URL where the video can be downloaded

content_type.description: MIME type of the video file

file_size.description: Size of the video file in bytes

usage_tips: Use detailed, descriptive prompts for better character and scene generation
Enable prompt optimizer for enhanced results with complex descriptions
10-second videos allow for more complex scenes and character development
Focus on visual details and cinematic elements in your prompts
Consider the narrative flow when describing character actions and environments
limitations: 10-second videos are not supported for 1080p resolution
Complex scenes with many elements may be challenging
Processing time increases with longer durations

pricing.estimated_cost: Higher cost for 10-second videos vs 6-second videos
